import React,{useState}from'react';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{signupUser}from'../redux/actions/userActions';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:''});const[error,setError]=useState('');const dispatch=useDispatch();const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const{name,email,password}=formData;// Basic validation
